sourcesContent:
<template>
  <baidu-map class="map" :center="center" :zoom="zoom" @ready="handler"></baidu-map>
  <bml-heatmap :data="data" :max="100" :radius="20">
  </bml-heatmap>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  data () {
    return {
      center: {lng: 0, lat: 0},
      zoom: 3
    }
  },
  methods: {
    handler ({BMap, map}) {
      console.log(BMap, map)
      this.center.lng = 116.404
      this.center.lat = 39.915
      this.zoom = 15
    }
  },

}
</script>

<style>
.map {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}
.BMap_cpyCtrl {
  display: none;
}
.anchorBL {
  display: none!important;
}
</style>
